creator: javaarchitect@msn.com
text: If Word document contains HTML fragments, then they appear in exact form in result of WordToHtmlConverter work. For example if I put in my Word something like Hey link, then result of HTML conversion will have a link, instead of the text. CSS security problem is also here. Minimal HTML encoding has to be applied for all text between tags in HTML conversion.

creator: javaarchitect@msn.com
text: it looks like the problem was introduced in used code
